title: RACING EVENT detail page Â» RACE TRACK
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see at which RACE TRACK each RACING EVENT took place\
So I can find other events that took place at the same venue
description:
* The RACING EVENT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected RACE TRACK.
* The RACE TRACK is presented with its name and primary information.
* The RACE TRACK contains a link to its detail page.
* The RACE TRACK has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACE TRACK connected to the RACING EVENT then the section is not displayed at all.
